email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

We have an inquiry for 150,000MT of iron ore, CFR Qingdao, with a laycan of Nov 10-15. Can you provide a vessel offer and indicative freight rate?

Best regards,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Jason,

Thanks for the inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN TITAN, DWT 180,000, LOA 290m. Indicative freight rate is $28.50/MT. Laycan Nov 10-15 is workable.

Let me know if this suits your needs.

Best,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Lisa,

Thanks for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you sharpen it to $27.00/MT? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Jason,

I can bring the rate down to $27.50/MT, which is the best I can do given the current market conditions. Demurrage rate is $20,000/day pro rata.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Lisa,

$27.50/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan and send over the charter party for review.

Best,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Jason,

Laycan confirmed for Nov 10-15. I will send the charter party within the next hour.

Best,
Lisa
